org.eclipse.papyrus.RobotML

Interface RoboticSystem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier, System
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActuatorSystem, CameraSystem, EngineSystem, GPSSystem, GraspingSystem, Gyroscope, ImageSensorSystem, InertialMeasurementUnitSystem, InertialNavigationSystem, InfraRedProximetrySystem, LegSystem, LidarSystem, LocalizationSensorSystem, LocomotionSystem, ObjectDetectionSensorSystem, ObjectTrackingSensorSystem, OdometrySystem, SensorSystem, SteeredWheelSystem, WeaponSystem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActuatorSystemImpl, CameraSystemImpl, EngineSystemImpl, GPSSystemImpl, GraspingSystemImpl, GyroscopeImpl, ImageSensorSystemImpl, InertialMeasurementUnitSystemImpl, InertialNavigationSystemImpl, InfraRedProximetrySystemImpl, LegSystemImpl, LidarSystemImpl, LocalizationSensorSystemImpl, LocomotionSystemImpl, ObjectDetectionSensorSystemImpl, ObjectTrackingSensorSystemImpl, OdometrySystemImpl, RoboticSystemImpl, SensorSystemImpl, SteeredWheelSystemImpl, WeaponSystemImpl

    public interface RoboticSystem
extends System
    A representation of the model object 'Robotic System'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Local Position
    • Local Orientation

    See Also:
    RobotMLPackage.getRoboticSystem()
